Name should by unique within this data source.
Name should contain minimum of 3 characters and maximum of 64 characters
Port should be between 1 - 1023
type should contain minimum of 1 and maximum of 128 characters

syslog is a standard for message logging. It allows separation of the software that generates messages, the system that stores them, and the software that reports and analyzes them.

Verify if data has been received from this data source. Data from this data source will be indexed and ready for your use.
